  <script>
    (function () {
      const generateUUID = () =>
        "xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx".replace(/[xy]/g, function (c) {
          const r = (Math.random() * 16) | 0;
          const v = c === "x" ? r : (r & 0x3) | 0x8;
          return v.toString(16);
        });
  
      let isLocalStorageAvailable = false;
      const isAvailable = () => {
        if (isLocalStorageAvailable) {
          return true;
        }
  
        try {
          const x = "__storage_test__";
          window.localStorage.setItem(x, x);
          window.localStorage.removeItem(x);
          isLocalStorageAvailable = true;
          return true;
        } catch (e) {
          return false;
        }
      };
  
      const unsafeSetItem = (key, value) => {
        window.localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(value));
      };
  
      const unsafeGetItem = (key) => {
        return JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem(key) || "null");
      };
  
      const setSafeItem = (key, value) => {
        if (isAvailable()) {
          unsafeSetItem(key, value);
        }
      };
  
      const getSafeItem = (key, defaultValue) => {
        return isAvailable() ? unsafeGetItem(key) : defaultValue;
      };
  
      const ANA_UID_KEY = "ana_uid";
      let currentUid = getSafeItem(ANA_UID_KEY, "");
      if (!currentUid) {
        currentUid = generateUUID();
        setSafeItem(ANA_UID_KEY, currentUid);
      }
      window.getAnaUid = () => currentUid;
    })();
  </script>

  <script>
  function initialize_wunderkind(d) {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      var e = d.createElement('script');
      e.src = d.location.protocol + '//tag.wknd.ai/5453/i.js';
      e.async = true;
      d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e);
    });
  }

  function determine_wunderkind_eligibility() {
    if (window.location.search.includes('enable_wunderkind')) {
      initialize_wunderkind(document);
      return;
    }

    let wunderkind_segment = 0;
    try { wunderkind_segment = localStorage.getItem('genius_wunderkind_segment'); } catch (e) {}

    if (typeof(wunderkind_segment) === 'string') {
      wunderkind_segment = Number(wunderkind_segment);
    } else {
      wunderkind_segment = Math.random();
      try { localStorage.setItem('genius_wunderkind_segment', wunderkind_segment); } catch (e) {}
    }

    if ((wunderkind_segment * 100) < 100.0) {
      window['com.Genius.wunderkind_cohort'] = 'wunderkind';
      initialize_wunderkind(document);
    } else {
      window['com.Genius.wunderkind_cohort'] = 'control';
    }
  }

  determine_wunderkind_eligibility();
</script>

class="SongDescription__Content-sc-615rvk-2 kRzyD"><div class="RichText__Container-oz284w-0 feNKBF"><p>“Taste” is the first track off of Sabrina Carpenter’s sixth studio album, <em>“Short n’ Sweet”</em>. It was released as the highly anticipated third single from the album with a music video featuring female actress, <a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenna_Ortega" rel="noopener nofollow">Jenna Ortega</a> on August 23rd, 2024, following <a href="https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-espresso-number-one-global-charts-1235722059/amp/" rel="noopener nofollow">smash hits</a> “<a href="https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics" rel="noopener" data-api_path="/songs/10257779">Espresso</a>” & “<a href="https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics" rel="noopener" data-api_path="/songs/10488398">Please Please Please</a>”.</p>

<p>Disco-infused & irresistibly danceable, “Taste” serves as the album’s opener, layering risqué innuendos with revenge and betrayal, stating that even if he’s cheating, she’ll allow it as he’s always got the taste of her on his lips.</p>

<p>The music video, much like the track, cheekily references many dark satirical movies, such as <em>’<a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ginger_Snaps_%28film" rel="noopener nofollow">Ginger Snaps</a>‘</em>, <em>’<a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Addams_Family_%281991_film" rel="noopener nofollow">The Addams Family</a>’</em>, & primarily <em>’<a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_Becomes_Her" rel="noopener nofollow">Death Becomes Her</a>’</em>, with Ortega playing Madeline, who’s played by <a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meryl_Streep" rel="noopener nofollow">Meryl Streep</a>, & Carpenter playing Helen, who’s played by <a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldie_Hawn" rel="noopener nofollow">Goldie Hawn</a></p></div></div></div><div class="ExpandableContent__ButtonContainer-sc-1165iv-3 htndFn"><button class="Button__Container-rtu9rw-0 gZBeJn geLHRn"><div id="artist_comment:song:10628610" class="QuestionTemplate__Container-sc-1is5n1p-1 eidldg"><div class="QuestionTemplate__Title-sc-1is5n1p-4 jgJhkV"><span>What did Sabrina Carpenter say about "Taste"?</span><button class="TextButton-sc-192nsqv-0 hVAZmF QuestionTemplate__ExpandButton-sc-1is5n1p-5 eGJNvA" type="button"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M0 10h24v4h-24z"></path></svg></button></div><div class="Answer__Container-sc-2neq6u-0 iHvEbL"><div class="Attribution__Container-sc-1nmry9o-0 cjDZYo"><div class="Attribution__Header-sc-1nmry9o-1 iPNsXE"><span><div class="Answer__AttributionLabel-sc-2neq6u-3 doQBGH">Genius Answer</div></span><button text-decoration="underline" type="button" class="TextButton-sc-192nsqv-0 ixMmYX">1 contributor</button></div></div><div class="Answer__Body-sc-2neq6u-1 fzIWba"><div class="RichText__Container-oz284w-0 feNKBF"><blockquote><p>So, ‘Taste’ is one of my favorite songs off the album and it says a lot about me and a lot about other people. I think it’s sort of poking fun of myself a little bit for my mistakes and also poking fun at the, kind of like, facepalm that is life and relationship and the, sort of, situations that it puts you in, um, and it’s just making lighthearted fun at the whole concept of, you know, people that you’ve been with moving on to other people, and, you know, I think it’s a very human thing but it’s certainly fun.</p></blockquote>

It was released as the highly anticipated third single from the album with a music video featuring female actress, Jenna Ortega on August 23rd, 2024, following smash hits “Espresso” & “Please Please Please”.\\n\\nDisco-infused & irresistibly danceable, “Taste” serves as the album’s opener, layering risqué innuendos with revenge and betrayal, stating that even if he’s cheating, she’ll allow it as he’s always got the taste of her on his lips.\\n\\nThe music video, much like the track, cheekily references many dark satirical movies, such as ’Ginger Snaps‘, ’The Addams Family’, & primarily ’Death Becomes Her’, with Ortega playing Madeline, who’s played by Meryl Streep, & Carpenter playing Helen, who’s played by Goldie Hawn\",\"description\":{\"markdown\":\"“Taste” is the first track off of Sabrina Carpenter’s sixth studio album, *“Short n’ Sweet”*. It was released as the highly anticipated third single from the album with a music video featuring female actress, [Jenna Ortega](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenna_Ortega ) on August 23rd, 2024, following [smash hits](https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-espresso-number-one-global-charts-1235722059/amp/) “[Espresso](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics)” & “[Please Please Please](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics)”. \\n\\nDisco-infused & irresistibly danceable, “Taste” serves as the album’s opener, layering risqué innuendos with revenge and betrayal, stating that even if he’s cheating, she’ll allow it as he’s always got the taste of her on his lips.\\n\\nThe music video, much like the track, cheekily references many dark satirical movies, such as *’[Ginger Snaps](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ginger_Snaps_(film)‘*, *’[The Addams Family](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Addams_Family_(1991_film)’*, & primarily *’[Death Becomes Her](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_Becomes_Her)’*, with Ortega playing Madeline, who’s played by [Meryl Streep](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meryl_Streep), & Carpenter playing Helen, who’s played by [Goldie Hawn](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldie_Hawn)\",\"html\":\"<p>“Taste” is the first track off of Sabrina Carpenter’s sixth studio album, <em>“Short n’ Sweet”<\/em>. [debuted](https://x.com/billboardcharts/status/1831015664284233893) at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the tracking week ending on August 29, 2024. This marked Sabrina\'s second highest-debut and her second highest-peaking song on the chart. The singer also became the [first soloist](https://www.billboard.com/lists/shaboozey-hot-100-eight-weeks-number-one-sabrina-carpenter-top-10/carpenter-sweetens-nos-2-3-4/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social) to ever chart her first three top five hits in the US simultaneously.\\nIn the UK, \\\"Taste\\\" [debuted](https://www.officialcharts.com/charts/singles-chart/) at #1 on the Official Singles Chart Top 100, which marked Sabrina\'s third #1 on the chart. On the charting week ending on August 29, 2024, Sabrina also became the first female artist in history to simultaneously hold the top 3 on the Official Singles Chart, with [\\\"Please Please Please\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics) at #2 and [\\\"Espresso\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics) at #3. \",\"body\":{\"markdown\":\"\\\"Taste\\\" [debuted](https://x.com/billboardcharts/status/1831015664284233893) at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the tracking week ending on August 29, 2024. This marked Sabrina\'s second highest-debut and her second highest-peaking song on the chart. The singer also became the [first soloist](https://www.billboard.com/lists/shaboozey-hot-100-eight-weeks-number-one-sabrina-carpenter-top-10/carpenter-sweetens-nos-2-3-4/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social) to ever chart her first three top five hits in the US simultaneously.\\nIn the UK, \\\"Taste\\\" [debuted](https://www.officialcharts.com/charts/singles-chart/) at #1 on the Official Singles Chart Top 100, which marked Sabrina\'s third #1 on the chart. On the charting week ending on August 29, 2024, Sabrina also became the first female artist in history to simultaneously hold the top 3 on the Official Singles Chart, with [\\\"Please Please Please\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics) at #2 and [\\\"Espresso\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics) at #3. \",\"html\":\"<p>“Taste” <a href=\\\"https://x.com/billboardcharts/status/1831015664284233893\\\" rel=\\\"noopener nofollow\\\">debuted<\/a> at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the tracking week ending on August 29, 2024. This marked Sabrina’s second highest-debut and her second highest-peaking song on the chart. The singer also became the <a href=\\\"https://www.billboard.com/lists/shaboozey-hot-100-eight-weeks-number-one-sabrina-carpenter-top-10/carpenter-sweetens-nos-2-3-4/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social\\\" rel=\\\"noopener nofollow\\\">first soloist<\/a> to ever chart her first three top five hits in the US simultaneously.<br>\\nIn the UK, “Taste” <a href=\\\"https://www.officialcharts.com/charts/singles-chart/\\\" rel=\\\"noopener nofollow\\\">debuted<\/a> at #1 on the Official Singles Chart Top 100, which marked Sabrina’s third #1 on the chart.   <script>
    (function () {
      const generateUUID = () =>
        "xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx".replace(/[xy]/g, function (c) {
          const r = (Math.random() * 16) | 0;
          const v = c === "x" ? r : (r & 0x3) | 0x8;
          return v.toString(16);
        });
  
      let isLocalStorageAvailable = false;
      const isAvailable = () => {
        if (isLocalStorageAvailable) {
          return true;
        }
  
        try {
          const x = "__storage_test__";
          window.localStorage.setItem(x, x);
          window.localStorage.removeItem(x);
          isLocalStorageAvailable = true;
          return true;
        } catch (e) {
          return false;
        }
      };
  
      const unsafeSetItem = (key, value) => {
        window.localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(value));
      };
  
      const unsafeGetItem = (key) => {
        return JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem(key) || "null");
      };
  
      const setSafeItem = (key, value) => {
        if (isAvailable()) {
          unsafeSetItem(key, value);
        }
      };
  
      const getSafeItem = (key, defaultValue) => {
        return isAvailable() ? unsafeGetItem(key) : defaultValue;
      };
  
      const ANA_UID_KEY = "ana_uid";
      let currentUid = getSafeItem(ANA_UID_KEY, "");
      if (!currentUid) {
        currentUid = generateUUID();
        setSafeItem(ANA_UID_KEY, currentUid);
      }
      window.getAnaUid = () => currentUid;
    })();
  </script>

  <script>
  function initialize_wunderkind(d) {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      var e = d.createElement('script');
      e.src = d.location.protocol + '//tag.wknd.ai/5453/i.js';
      e.async = true;
      d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e);
    });
  }

  function determine_wunderkind_eligibility() {
    if (window.location.search.includes('enable_wunderkind')) {
      initialize_wunderkind(document);
      return;
    }

    let wunderkind_segment = 0;
    try { wunderkind_segment = localStorage.getItem('genius_wunderkind_segment'); } catch (e) {}

    if (typeof(wunderkind_segment) === 'string') {
      wunderkind_segment = Number(wunderkind_segment);
    } else {
      wunderkind_segment = Math.random();
      try { localStorage.setItem('genius_wunderkind_segment', wunderkind_segment); } catch (e) {}
    }

    if ((wunderkind_segment * 100) < 100.0) {
      window['com.Genius.wunderkind_cohort'] = 'wunderkind';
      initialize_wunderkind(document);
    } else {
      window['com.Genius.wunderkind_cohort'] = 'control';
    }
  }

  determine_wunderkind_eligibility();
</script>

class="SongDescription__Content-sc-615rvk-2 kRzyD"><div class="RichText__Container-oz284w-0 feNKBF"><p>“Taste” is the first track off of Sabrina Carpenter’s sixth studio album, <em>“Short n’ Sweet”</em>. It was released as the highly anticipated third single from the album with a music video featuring female actress, <a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenna_Ortega" rel="noopener nofollow">Jenna Ortega</a> on August 23rd, 2024, following <a href="https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-espresso-number-one-global-charts-1235722059/amp/" rel="noopener nofollow">smash hits</a> “<a href="https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics" rel="noopener" data-api_path="/songs/10257779">Espresso</a>” & “<a href="https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics" rel="noopener" data-api_path="/songs/10488398">Please Please Please</a>”.</p>

<p>Disco-infused & irresistibly danceable, “Taste” serves as the album’s opener, layering risqué innuendos with revenge and betrayal, stating that even if he’s cheating, she’ll allow it as he’s always got the taste of her on his lips.</p>

<p>The music video, much like the track, cheekily references many dark satirical movies, such as <em>’<a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ginger_Snaps_%28film" rel="noopener nofollow">Ginger Snaps</a>‘</em>, <em>’<a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Addams_Family_%281991_film" rel="noopener nofollow">The Addams Family</a>’</em>, & primarily <em>’<a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_Becomes_Her" rel="noopener nofollow">Death Becomes Her</a>’</em>, with Ortega playing Madeline, who’s played by <a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meryl_Streep" rel="noopener nofollow">Meryl Streep</a>, & Carpenter playing Helen, who’s played by <a href="https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldie_Hawn" rel="noopener nofollow">Goldie Hawn</a></p></div></div></div><div class="ExpandableContent__ButtonContainer-sc-1165iv-3 htndFn"><button class="Button__Container-rtu9rw-0 gZBeJn geLHRn"><div id="artist_comment:song:10628610" class="QuestionTemplate__Container-sc-1is5n1p-1 eidldg"><div class="QuestionTemplate__Title-sc-1is5n1p-4 jgJhkV"><span>What did Sabrina Carpenter say about "Taste"?</span><button class="TextButton-sc-192nsqv-0 hVAZmF QuestionTemplate__ExpandButton-sc-1is5n1p-5 eGJNvA" type="button"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M0 10h24v4h-24z"></path></svg></button></div><div class="Answer__Container-sc-2neq6u-0 iHvEbL"><div class="Attribution__Container-sc-1nmry9o-0 cjDZYo"><div class="Attribution__Header-sc-1nmry9o-1 iPNsXE"><span><div class="Answer__AttributionLabel-sc-2neq6u-3 doQBGH">Genius Answer</div></span><button text-decoration="underline" type="button" class="TextButton-sc-192nsqv-0 ixMmYX">1 contributor</button></div></div><div class="Answer__Body-sc-2neq6u-1 fzIWba"><div class="RichText__Container-oz284w-0 feNKBF"><blockquote><p>So, ‘Taste’ is one of my favorite songs off the album and it says a lot about me and a lot about other people. I think it’s sort of poking fun of myself a little bit for my mistakes and also poking fun at the, kind of like, facepalm that is life and relationship and the, sort of, situations that it puts you in, um, and it’s just making lighthearted fun at the whole concept of, you know, people that you’ve been with moving on to other people, and, you know, I think it’s a very human thing but it’s certainly fun.</p></blockquote>

It was released as the highly anticipated third single from the album with a music video featuring female actress, Jenna Ortega on August 23rd, 2024, following smash hits “Espresso” & “Please Please Please”.\\n\\nDisco-infused & irresistibly danceable, “Taste” serves as the album’s opener, layering risqué innuendos with revenge and betrayal, stating that even if he’s cheating, she’ll allow it as he’s always got the taste of her on his lips.\\n\\nThe music video, much like the track, cheekily references many dark satirical movies, such as ’Ginger Snaps‘, ’The Addams Family’, & primarily ’Death Becomes Her’, with Ortega playing Madeline, who’s played by Meryl Streep, & Carpenter playing Helen, who’s played by Goldie Hawn\",\"description\":{\"markdown\":\"“Taste” is the first track off of Sabrina Carpenter’s sixth studio album, *“Short n’ Sweet”*. It was released as the highly anticipated third single from the album with a music video featuring female actress, [Jenna Ortega](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenna_Ortega ) on August 23rd, 2024, following [smash hits](https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-espresso-number-one-global-charts-1235722059/amp/) “[Espresso](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics)” & “[Please Please Please](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics)”. \\n\\nDisco-infused & irresistibly danceable, “Taste” serves as the album’s opener, layering risqué innuendos with revenge and betrayal, stating that even if he’s cheating, she’ll allow it as he’s always got the taste of her on his lips.\\n\\nThe music video, much like the track, cheekily references many dark satirical movies, such as *’[Ginger Snaps](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ginger_Snaps_(film)‘*, *’[The Addams Family](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Addams_Family_(1991_film)’*, & primarily *’[Death Becomes Her](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_Becomes_Her)’*, with Ortega playing Madeline, who’s played by [Meryl Streep](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meryl_Streep), & Carpenter playing Helen, who’s played by [Goldie Hawn](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldie_Hawn)\",\"html\":\"<p>“Taste” is the first track off of Sabrina Carpenter’s sixth studio album, <em>“Short n’ Sweet”<\/em>. [debuted](https://x.com/billboardcharts/status/1831015664284233893) at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the tracking week ending on August 29, 2024. This marked Sabrina\'s second highest-debut and her second highest-peaking song on the chart. The singer also became the [first soloist](https://www.billboard.com/lists/shaboozey-hot-100-eight-weeks-number-one-sabrina-carpenter-top-10/carpenter-sweetens-nos-2-3-4/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social) to ever chart her first three top five hits in the US simultaneously.\\nIn the UK, \\\"Taste\\\" [debuted](https://www.officialcharts.com/charts/singles-chart/) at #1 on the Official Singles Chart Top 100, which marked Sabrina\'s third #1 on the chart. On the charting week ending on August 29, 2024, Sabrina also became the first female artist in history to simultaneously hold the top 3 on the Official Singles Chart, with [\\\"Please Please Please\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics) at #2 and [\\\"Espresso\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics) at #3. \",\"body\":{\"markdown\":\"\\\"Taste\\\" [debuted](https://x.com/billboardcharts/status/1831015664284233893) at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the tracking week ending on August 29, 2024. This marked Sabrina\'s second highest-debut and her second highest-peaking song on the chart. The singer also became the [first soloist](https://www.billboard.com/lists/shaboozey-hot-100-eight-weeks-number-one-sabrina-carpenter-top-10/carpenter-sweetens-nos-2-3-4/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social) to ever chart her first three top five hits in the US simultaneously.\\nIn the UK, \\\"Taste\\\" [debuted](https://www.officialcharts.com/charts/singles-chart/) at #1 on the Official Singles Chart Top 100, which marked Sabrina\'s third #1 on the chart. On the charting week ending on August 29, 2024, Sabrina also became the first female artist in history to simultaneously hold the top 3 on the Official Singles Chart, with [\\\"Please Please Please\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics) at #2 and [\\\"Espresso\\\"](https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics) at #3. \",\"html\":\"<p>“Taste” <a href=\\\"https://x.com/billboardcharts/status/1831015664284233893\\\" rel=\\\"noopener nofollow\\\">debuted<\/a> at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart during the tracking week ending on August 29, 2024. This marked Sabrina’s second highest-debut and her second highest-peaking song on the chart. The singer also became the <a href=\\\"https://www.billboard.com/lists/shaboozey-hot-100-eight-weeks-number-one-sabrina-carpenter-top-10/carpenter-sweetens-nos-2-3-4/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social\\\" rel=\\\"noopener nofollow\\\">first soloist<\/a> to ever chart her first three top five hits in the US simultaneously.<br>\\nIn the UK, “Taste” <a href=\\\"https://www.officialcharts.com/charts/singles-chart/\\\" rel=\\\"noopener nofollow\\\">debuted<\/a> at #1 on the Official Singles Chart Top 100, which marked Sabrina’s third #1 on the chart. On the charting week ending on August 29, 2024, Sabrina also became the first female artist in history to simultaneously hold the top 3 on the Official Singles Chart, with <a href=\\\"https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-please-please-please-lyrics\\\" rel=\\\"noopener\\\" data-api_path=\\\"/songs/10488398\\\">“Please Please Please”<\/a> at #2 and <a href=\\\"https://genius.com/Sabrina-carpenter-espresso-lyrics\\\" rel=\\\"noopener\\\" data-api_path=\\\"/songs/10257779\\\">“Espresso”<\/a> at
